title: Portfolio Website
subtitle: Personal Website - Dedeen.dev
description: A responsive portfolio website built with Vue 3 and Tailwind CSS.
Setup automatic deployment with Github Actions and Firebase hosting.
Optimized for performance and accessibility.

title: Auth portal
subtitle: A portal that allows me to integrate user management for my hobby projects
description: Authentication portal for integrating user management into hobby projects.
Simple, secure login system built with modern web technologies.

title: Language Guesser
subtitle: Built as a fun side project to learn more about natural language processing.
description: A python application that uses multiple data sources to guess the language of a given text.
It makes use of n-grams to make a guess of the language of the provided text.
It supports the following languages: German, English, French, Italian, Dutch, Russian and Swedish.
If given more data it can easily be extended to support more languages.

title: Party App
subtitle: A party games app!
description: Build an application for keeping track of scores in party games.
Setup authentication and storage in firebase.
Created an android App for Smart TV's to showcase the hiscores and games on your TV!

title: Munch
subtitle: An app used to aid in cooking!
description: The application keeps track of certain ingredients and then shows you which recipes you can make.
The recipes contain step-by-step instructions on how to make them.
Setup storage using and deployed with firebase.

title: TicTacToe
subtitle: A game of tic tac toe with an implementation of the minimax algorithm
description: The application uses the algorithm to determine the best move for the AI player.
It is written in Java and uses the processing library.
Developed as part of my study for software engineering.

title: RS-API
subtitle: An API for the game Runescape made for practicing with Spring Boot
description: A RESTful API for retrieving data about Runescape skills, bosses and activities.
Built with Spring Boot and Maven.
Deployable with the dockerfile.
